radiation
=========

A python port of the FV3GFS radiation scheme (RRTMG). Provides a radiation driver class (``radiation.radiation_driver.RadiationDriver``), which is most easily run using a simplified wrapper class (``radiation.Radiation``) and its configuration class (``radiation.RadiationConfig``).
